mathematical operations
[trend function (trend)]


Functions

REAL surfit::trend_getValue (REAL x, REAL y)
 calculates surfit_trend value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::trend_resid (const char *filename)
 calculates residuals between surfit_task and surfit_trend. Saves result to text file.
bool surfit::trend_project ()
 recalculates trendtion on surfit_grid using bilinear interpolation algorithm
REAL surfit::trend_minz ()
 calculates minimum value of Z for surfit_trend
REAL surfit::trend_maxz ()
 calculates maximum value of Z for surfit_trend
REAL surfit::trend_mean ()
 calculates mean value of Z for surfit_trend
REAL surfit::trend_std (REAL mean)
 calculates standard deviation from mean value of Z for surfit_trend
bool surfit::trend_plus (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend + fnc. trendtions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::trend_minus (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend - fnc. undef_value means no operation. trendtions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::trend_minus_undef (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend - fnc. trendtions sizes must be equal.
bool surfit::trend_mult (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend * fnc. trendtions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::trend_div (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend / fnc. trendtions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::trend_set (trend *fnc)
 surfit_trend = fnc. trendtions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::trend_plus_real (REAL val)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend + val
bool surfit::trend_minus_real (REAL val)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend - val
bool surfit::trend_mult_real (REAL val)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend * val
bool surfit::trend_div_real (REAL val)
 surfit_trend = surfit_trend / val
bool surfit::trend_set_real (REAL val)
 surfit_trend = val
